title: Executive Order 6785-Delegation of Authority to the Secretary of the Interior Under Section 9 of the National Industrial Recovery Act
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 2 (b) of title I of the National Industrial Recovery Act, approved June 16, 1933 (ch. 90, 48 Stat. 195), and in order to effectuate the purposes of the said title, I hereby designate and appoint the Secretary of the Interior to exercise on my behalf and in my stead all the functions and powers vested in me by subdivisions (a) and (b) of section 9 of the said act.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6785-Delegation of Authority to the Secretary of the Interior Under Section 9 of the National Industrial Recovery Act Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373388
